bug.author: jiemar
bug.summary: "hadoop fs -ls /path" is different from "alluxio fs ls -f /path"
bug.description: problem description: hadoop fs -ls /path, we can see there is a txt file. while use alluxio fs ls -f /path , there is nothing displayed. hadoop fs -ls /user/hive/warehouse/bnh_szy_mask.db/szy_xsh_cxapp_szy_aims_list -rw-r----- 3 hduser8105 hduser8105 7321 2020-05-09 03:24 /user/hive/warehouse/bnh_szy_mask.db/szy_xsh_cxapp_szy_aims_list/szy_xsh_cxapp_szy_aims_list.txt ../alluxio fs ls -f /user/hive/warehouse/bnh_szy_mask.db/szy_xsh_cxapp_szy_aims_list (nothing displayed)
